plot: Orphaned and poor Ajay meets with wealthy Aarti, and both fall in love. Their hopes to marry are dashed to the ground, when Aarti's dad, Dhanraj, vehemently opposes any alliance with Ajay ...
title: Ilzaam
plot_es: Orphaned and poor Ajay meets with wealthy Aarti, and both fall in love. Their hopes to marry are dashed to the ground, when Aarti's dad, Dhanraj, vehemently opposes any alliance with Ajay ...
plot_en: Orphaned and poor Ajay meets with wealthy Aarti, and both fall in love. Their hopes to marry are dashed to the ground, when Aarti's dad, Dhanraj, vehemently opposes any alliance with Ajay ...
